A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Despite what the fanboys (and they are\, almost invariably\, boys) are saying\, I enjoyed this movie overall. Granted\, there were a few curious choices made\, and the film was not as cohesive as The Force Awakens. Still\, these were ultimately in service of the characters' progression (and\, in terms of character development\, this was one of the more realistic Star Wars films). A worthy addition to the new trilogy.
